column5: Hello  So I posted WHO WOULD LIKE TO GO ICE FISHING and Mark AKA BUICK14 posted lets go....   So 8am off we go to Cooks Bay for some perch action..    Arrive to find that there isnt alot of people fishing where we were.  So I check the Navionics for the IPHONE and off we go looking for 23- 27 ft of water...  When we set up the hut and started fishing Mark pulled out his AQUA VIEW (very cool by the way) and I pull out my sonar and we start catching fish right way..  The action was hot and steady with breaks of about 10-20 minutes between schools of fish.. Half way though the day A CO stops by to check for licenses and off he went...Good to see them on the ice,  I dont mind being checked..  Here are some pics for the day,  the last pick is 30 good size fish  for the table with over 50 released and probally another 50+ missed..       OUR BOUNTY   INSIDE AND OUT OF OUR FORTRESS    Thanks again to BUICK14 (mark) for a great day and I look forward in fishing again soon  Dave

Right on man....  Note to self: keep st croix ice rods away from Mr. Buddy Heater.....Anybody looking for a custom ice rod?  I tell you, pictures don't do justice...there were some nice fish, and you can agree; those perch were biting real soft today....walleye-like short strikes for sure... Without that aqua vu, I wouldnt have had half those fish  We did better than the guy beside us for sure lol
Good stuff guys !  Dave post the big pic.. not them little clickers.
Great report and pics DMASSE You can't beat getting into steady action like that.... congrats Thanks for sharing Leechman

IRISHFIELD  I think all you have to do is click the thumb nail for the full sizw pics  BUICK  they are tasting great right now on my perch Burger...  Those guys shouldnt have been using 1 oz crippled hearing and  60lbs test attached to spreaders... LOL  Good day and YUM
NO WORRIES BUD  I JUST DIDNT WANT TO TAKE UP TO MUCH SPACE, I THOUGH WE WERE LIMITED IN POSTING PICTURE SIZES...SO I POSTED THUMBS YOUR HELP IS ALWAYS WELCOME  Thanks again  Dave
They're only links Dave.. they don't take up any memory of OFC's. Link the full size "properties" for a better post.
IRISHFIELD  Thanks I didnt know that I have been posting thumbnails for awhile and no one has said anything  Dave
Good job guys. I love the aqua View pics. Really good for keeping you motivated on a cold day.  Clarence
Looks like you had a great feed of Perch!
